channel.title: Adding object training probelm
channel.description:
I'm trying to add object training to my server and i've added the xp to the object but now i'm trying to make it so that they can't mass click. I need help heres my coding.
[code] case 2513: if(actionTimer == 0) { anim(645); Send("You shoot the target"); addSkillXP((5000*playerLevel[4]), 4); addSkillXP((2000*playerLevel[3]), 3); actionTimer = 1; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;[/code]
now when i compile it says
[code].\Client.java:4708: cannot find symbol symbol : variable actionTimer location: class Client if(actionTimer == 0) ^ .\Client.java:4714: cannot find symbol symbol : variable actionTimer location: class Client actionTimer = 1; ^ .\Client.java:4721: cannot find symbol symbol : variable actionTimer location: class Client if(actionTimer == 0) ^ .\Client.java:4727: cannot find symbol symbol : variable actionTimer location: class Client actionTimer = 1; ^ .\Client.java:4734: cannot find symbol symbol : variable actionTimer location: class Client if(actionTimer == 0) ^ .\Client.java:4740: cannot find symbol symbol : variable actionTimer location: class Client actionTimer = 1; ^ .\Client.java:4747: cannot find symbol symbol : variable actionTimer location: class Client if(actionTimer == 0) ^ .\Client.java:4753: cannot find symbol symbol : variable actionTimer location: class Client actionTimer = 1; ^ .\Client.java:4895: cannot find symbol symbol : variable ActionTimer location: class Client if(ActionTimer == 0) { ^ .\Client.java:4901: cannot find symbol symbol : variable ActionTimer location: class Client ActionTimer = 1; ^ .\Client.java:4910: cannot find symbol symbol : variable ActionTimer location: class Client if(ActionTimer == 0) { ^ .\Client.java:4921: cannot find symbol symbol : variable ActionTimer location: class Client ActionTimer = 1; ^ Note: .\Stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 12 errors Press any key to continue . . . [/code]

item.title: Adding object training probelm
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“idkman, post:12, topic:261811”][quote author=jc22493 link=topic=345750.msg2664770#msg2664770 date=1234475741]

[quote author=idkman link=topic=345750.msg2664765#msg2664765 date=1234475576]

Thanks for repeating what I said 2 times.
[/quote] … I posted before i saw your post. Plus, My post was more informative. I actually gave him the int to declare. GF[quote author=element0189 link=topic=345750.msg2664752#msg2664752 date=1234475103]
Thank you
[/quote] Your welcome.

Wow, don’t have to get all arrogant, eh? It’s just a post.
[/quote]Arrogant? I’m making a point.[/quote]
“GF”

Read full topic

item.title: Adding object training probelm
item.dc:creator: @idkman idkman
item.description:
@idkman wrote:

public int actionTimer = 0; Your client class obviously doesn’t have the int “actionTimer” declared.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding object training probelm
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

You don’t have a variable named “actionTimer” in your client class.

Read full topic
